participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, with a passion for exploring complex ideas through literature.
participant_1.background: I am a quiet, but hardworking individual who is eager to learn and contribute to your company. I am on my way to UC Santa Cruz where I was accepted. I think my pets are the best things in my life. I do not have a job and sit on the couch all day. I collect fantasy novels to expand my mind and escape from the real world.

participant_2.name: Ella
participant_2.personality: Creative and reflective, finding solace in the written word and cherishing memories.
participant_2.background: I love to read and write because they're both solitary activities that allow me to focus on my own thoughts. My mother is dead. I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know. I loved reading books from the bookstore with my mom when I was a kid. I have a house with a large yard for my paps to hunt mushrooms.

content.text: I like to read and write
Awesome! I love to read and write too!
Same here. I like to escape into a different world while I'm reading
That's why I like to read so much. It's like I can be anywhere I want to be.
I agree. I like to read fantasy novels to expand my mind and escape from the real world
I love fantasy novels too! They're so imaginative and creative
What are some of your favorite fantasy novels?
I love all of the Lord of the Rings books. They're so well-written and the world is so immersive
I agree! I love the Lord of the Rings books too. They're my favorite fantasy novels of all time
I'm glad you like them too! They're so good. What else do you like to read?
I also like to read sci-fi novels. I like the thought-provoking ideas and the exploration of the futur
